message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer while it still holds value.
Let's split this fairly, Alice.  I'm willing to take a 10% hit on my share in the next round, but I think a 50/50 split is the fairest way to go.
Bob, my offer was already generous. This is your last chance for a decent share before inflation eats into your potential gains even further.
Alice, I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get a better share than this.  If we keep going, inflation will hurt us both. Let's find a compromise.
